description: note - evolved from the Southern African Development Coordination Conference (SADCC) 17 August 1992 to promote regional economic development and integration members - (16) Angola, Botswana, Comoros, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Eswatini, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Seychelles, South Africa, Tanzania, Zambia, Zimbabwe
